Title: Oh Mercy!
Writer: Mosco Boucault (film: Roubaix,  Commissariat central), Arnaud Desplechin (dialogue), Arnaud Desplechin (screenplay), Léa Mysius (dialogue), Léa Mysius (screenplay)
Actors: Roschdy Zem, Léa Seydoux, Sara Forestier, Antoine Reinartz
Plot: A police chief in northern France tries to solve a case where an old woman was brutally murdered.
